abstract: A Nielsen study showed that the volume of tweets about a television show corresponded strongly to viewers’ real-time reactions as measured by a brain monitor.

headline.main: Study of TV Viewers Backs Twitter’s Claims to Be Barometer of Public Mood
headline.print_headline: Study of TV Viewers Backs Twitter’s Claims to Be Barometer of Public Mood

snippet: A Nielsen study showed that the volume of tweets about a television show corresponded strongly to viewers’ real-time reactions as measured by a brain monitor.
